title: My Verizon google 4xl is not able to hear me on calls- poor cell service. This is wifi calling. Help
content: I can't be heard during incoming or outgoing calls in my home. Works fine away from home. We have great wifi. Data no problem. Only phone audio problems. Sometimes miss incoming calls, too. Wifi calling is selected. I've played w settings. Can't figure it out!!! Help! I need a working phone in my home!!!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
